description.value:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

Even in death, a dragon's gaze is terrible to behold. When used to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Breathe Fire] at 3rd rank or higher, an eye from a dragon causes the spell to manifest some of the creature's fearsome aura and inspire terror. Creatures in the spell's area must attempt a basic Will save instead of a basic Reflex save, and in addition to taking the spell's normal damage on a failure, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}. This adds the emotion, fear, and mental traits to the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Dragon Eye]
